data.text: @Sanjaym60021151 Hi Sanjay! Can you please inform your feedback case number as a DM so that I can check the status of your claim? -Sara

@KristoferA At this moment some services are unavailable at this moment on the website due some technical issues and updates. During that time the services can be bought from our customer either via chat or calling. Apologies for the inconvenience! -Anu

@rollofunk Hello Mikael, sorry to hear that ski bag is lost. Have you informed our arrival services about it? You can contact our arrival services and ask them to check if the ski bag has been found. -Anu
@alexstubb Kiitos! Olemme ylpeitä voituamme palvella asiakkaita rallienglannilla jo vuodesta 1923, joten eiköhän sillä linjalla jatketa vielä seuraavatkin sata vuotta.

@alexstubb Vii aar veri sori foor the long veit taims. Olemme palkanneet aspaan lisää väkeä ja pyrimme purkamaan omikronin aiheuttamaa sumaa niin pian kuin mahdollista. Kiitämme kärsivällisyydestäsi. Kannattaa kokeilla myös chattia sivuillamme: https://t.co/GtSKqN6bP1 Heidi / Finnair
@ElMundoOk Hi, we start the sales in the beginning of March and at that point we will also introduce the routes and schedules for the first flights with the new cabins :) /Elli
@LordYingHong Hi, Please DM us your booking reference and travel dates so we can look into this. /Elli
@AshleyPheely Sorry for the disappointment. If you still need us to check this further, please DM us your booking reference so we can check. /Elli

During 2021, travel increased and EBITDA turned positive; Omicron’s negative impact was notable but short-term. Read Finnair Financial Statements Release 1 January–31 December 2021 here: https://t.co/qu1WSQRXjS https://t.co/aPfYpdhrws

The new Iittala Kuulas tableware designed by Harri Koskinen creates a moment of Nordic living in the air. Each piece of the collection has been designed to elevate your dining experience and reduce the overall weight on board on our new long-haul cabins. https://t.co/azubqOuzLr https://t.co/tyAXbIagky

data.text: Finnair cabin crew’s strike has been cancelled. A new collective labour agreement has been reached today for the Finnair cabin crew in Finland. https://t.co/6AyYrrIdxl

@rhysthomas_rhys Hi! I am sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience. If you wish to give feedback to us, you can do it on our website: https://t.co/go5dEuPYLm. I can also forward your feedback if you tell more as a DM and inform your booking reference and e-mail address. -Sara

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any time. If the passenger cannot reach an agreement with Finnair Customer Relations,

data.text: @LBabkirk We are renewing all our A350s and A330s during 2022-2023. The first routes with the renewed aircraft will be announced on 1 March. Stay tuned! 😊 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@swest1991 Happy to hear you enjoyed your meals! Welcome on board soon again. 😊 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: Is your skiing trip coming up? We recommend you do check-in in advance to get a smooth start to your journey. urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: Confirm your coronavirus related documents before your journey with our pre-check my certificates tool when checking in in advance online or through the Finnair app. The new feature allows you to upload your documents for a pre-check. Read more: https://t.co/mUFDqnGGPX https://t.co/WxZTrEnCuS

From today onwards, our Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport are open normally: Finnair Lounge in the Schengen area from 5.30 a.m. to 11.30 p.m. and Finnair Business Lounge in the non-Schengen area from 6 a.m. until midnight. Welcome for a visit! https://t.co/UzI3bxjLBg

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

data.text: In our Business Class, you’ll find the very best in premium Nordic design, from the incredible Finnair exclusive Collins’ AirLounge seat to a transformative new design language that ties together our Finnair Lounges and departure hall at Helsinki Airport. https://t.co/K0OPGGAAat

Our Business Class is the embodiment of Finnair. A signature premium Nordic experience down to the very last detail. Designed to maximise your travel comfort and respect your privacy on board. Discover more at https://t.co/51vfDHmryH. https://t.co/f8YeKaG8Yi

Discover an enhanced home-like space with the entirely new Collins’ AirLounge seat in the redesigned Business Class: functional stowage features and amplified personal space and privacy. We’d love to hear what your favourite features are? https://t.co/azubqOuzLr https://t.co/ZIEGz7bsy3

data.text: It was easy to see the excitement of the speakers who have worked closely with the project during the past four years. Our new long-haul experience is an embodiment of the modern premium airline we want to be. https://t.co/7gB6EY2ORe

data.text: @TopiManner, Finnair’s CEO stated: “I am extremely proud to say that we are today unveiling the work of a very dedicated team of people who have been putting their heart and their soul into defining what the long-haul experience at Finnair should be.” https://t.co/Nh1m2WhFE3

Today’s online press conference was hosted from our beautiful Platinum Wing Lounge at Helsinki Airport where @paivyttallqvist, Finnair’s Senior Vice President, Communications warmly welcomed our listeners to hear more about our new elevated long-haul experience. https://t.co/7AFwF8IhV2
@JebBrooks See you on board!

We hope you are sharing our excitement and smiles when seeing our new elevated long-haul experience. Watch a 30-minute recording of today’s press event here: https://t.co/70bO1DImEf https://t.co/NoW7cRHFdW

data.text:
@Christine_ML Hello Christine. 
Thank you for your message. Yes you can, if it fits within our maximum permitted dimensions (55cm x 40cm x 23cm or 22in x 16in x 9in) for your carry-on baggage. Please note that limited wardrobe space is available; consult our cabin crew once on board. -Anu

data.text: @tskytta Hi Timo, we don't have plans to have San Francisco in our network this year, as we will already have two West Coast destinations: Los Angeles and Seattle. I can forward your wish to get SFO back. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

In January, Finnair carried 451,300 passengers, which was 427.3% more than in January 2021. The number of passengers in January 2022 was 25.1% less than in December 2021.  https://t.co/otD2qdgV5l https://t.co/mLidb7K98N

@doankev @FinnairSuomi Hi Kevin, could you please DM your case number, flight number and contact information. I will try to get you some information asap. I sincerely apologise for this! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@WTXJET @cybycmu @traveloneworld In case you want to get to know our lounges beforehand: https://t.co/UzI3bxjLBg. Welcome for a relaxing visit! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @WTXJET @traveloneworld Welcome on board! ✈️ I hope you will enjoy our beautiful A350 and flying with us for the first time. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@fegarates Thank you for your nice feedback, Felipe! And big apologies for the broken luggage. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@MAQAD_ Hi, this depends on whether you are fully vaccinated or fulfil another condition defined in the Communicable Diseases Act. You can check those here: https://t.co/diJSSEzRB8. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: In Manage booking, you can view and change your booking, and customise your travel experience with travel extras. Read our article to find out what features we currently offer in the service, and what kind of development plans we have for the future: https://t.co/I30SAx4PwD

@Gair06 Hi Gair, if you aren't able to make the change in our Manage booking, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy and they can make the change for you. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@Andy_1080 Hi, I am sorry for the wait! Our average refund handling time is currently 14-21 days and can be even longer for some cases. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

We have published a new Timetables page on our website, where you can easily check which days and what times we fly to certain destinations and how many daily flights we might have. Check out the page at https://t.co/mPVNVYqN9U. https://t.co/YGZ0Vpq2zf

urls.title: Finnair timetables
urls.description: Check the Finnair flight timetables in a calendar view and see the flight numbers, frequencies and other details.

data.text: The big winter games in Beijing are starting soon, and we want to wish the best of luck to all the athletes competing in them! Check out our Blue Wings story to find out what are some of the winter sports you can try yourself when visiting Finland: https://t.co/N8Kpl0YtFA
@LeenaManner Hei Leena! Olen pahoillani ettet saanut meihin yhteyttä. Lähettäisitkö meille yksityisviestillä kysymyksesi sekä varaustietosi, niin katsotaan voisinko auttaa sinua tätä kautta? -Petra

We have extended our flexible booking policy so that you can book flights and make your travel plans worry-free. Until 31 May 2022, you can change your travel dates as many times as you wish. After that, you can still make one additional change. https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @RajBhattacharya That is absolutely correct and you can also find some additional and useful information by following this link: https://t.co/NP8VIH0Xyc Best wishes, Colin / Finnair

@RajBhattacharya Hello @RajBhattacharjee and thank you for contacting us. We require tickets even for our youngest travelers however it is up to you to decide if you would like to buy a separate seat for the infant or hold it in your lap. Kind regards, Kolyo / Finnair

Does your destination require a negative coronavirus test result? We offer you affordable coronavirus testing near Helsinki Airport or through our partners Pihlajalinna and Terveystalo throughout Finland. Read more about the options at: https://t.co/LzGZBYEgSs

data.text: @RandyTa23532540 Hi, our average handling time for refunds is currently 14-21 days. Some requests may, unfortunately, take more time to be handled. We will inform you via email after your refund application is processed. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ejyounkin @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service! Could you please still try one more time? You can find all their phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@mariannep_piano Hi, I am extremely sorry for the congestion in our customer service channels lately! We have now gotten there more employees, could you kindly try contacting the customer service again? You can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@JPoutanen @FinnairHelps @FinnairSuomi Hi, if you aren't able to change your travel dates in Manage booking, our customer service can do the change for you. The refund goes according to your ticket type (our Flex ticket is fully refundable). Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@lindseyayotte @British_Airways Hi, kindly contact our customer service and see if there is something they could do for you: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: Travelling to Finland from the EU/Schengen countries eases from 1 February onwards. urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: Where should you head for a relaxing beach holiday in guaranteed warmth right now? Where can you spend a more active holiday under the sun? And where to explore the local villages in a pleasant climate? Check out our top five winter sun destinations: https://t.co/xSFYNkNdjc https://t.co/7xSE6bjqM2

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @NFair_official Thank you! We agree that @HelsinkiAirport is simply beautiful 🥰

@anjela_taneja Hi Anjela, please contact our customer service regarding this. You can find their phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I don't unfortunately have access to our booking system to check this. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@DanaeVirgilio @FinnairHelps Hi, have you tried changing your flight in Manage booking: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA? If that doesn't work, please contact our customer service once more. You can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @jamiebsmith Definitely the very best way to start your day! 💙
@starsoversea @FinnairSuomi Wow, lucky you! 💚

The renewed Helsinki Airport’s Terminal 2 opened at the beginning of December – have you already seen it? Finnair departure hall services are gradually moving to the new building, while the new arrivals hall is open already now: https://t.co/pbtG4v5GH3. Smooth travels! https://t.co/xXE1gH04cS

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: Due to corona related restrictions for restaurants, our lounges at Helsinki Airport close at 6 pm and serving alcohol ends at 5 pm. These restrictions are valid until 15 February. The restrictions also affect other restaurant services at Helsinki Airport: https://t.co/jaIikLFCRa https://t.co/q9je9Pf2Rk

@rohitnadhe Hi, you can reach our customer service currently via the chatbot on our website or by calling them: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. They are unfortunately not checking the direct message here for now. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@MarcBernal3 Hi, you can do your check-in via us, and the luggage policy is also ours. Have a nice flight! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@DanaeVirgilio @FinnairHelps Hi, please contact our customer service via chat on our website or phone call. I don't, unfortunately, have access to our booking system. You can find customer service contact information here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@katruns26point2 Hi, what kind of question do you have? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@doankev @FinnairSuomi Hi, I am so sorry for this! Are you able to follow the status of your baggage through WorldTracer service, using your last name and the report number? Here is more information: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@larakur274 Hi, please contact our customer service via chat or by phone call. You can find the contact information here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I don't unfortunately have access to any of the systems to check this one for you. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@Bramsceaux Hi, covid tests are not required for our domestic flights. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @gavintooting @kate_maisey @British_Airways @qatarairways @VirginAtlantic Hi, our flexible booking policy is currently valid until the end of Feb '22: https://t.co/NQN3hfr52T, but even after that, you are allowed to make one change to your travel dates. If you purchase our Flex ticket, you are able to cancel and get refunded. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @marcusorbe @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the congestion in our customer service channels at the moment! There is more information on booking an award flight with our partner airlines here: https://t.co/q0a5NlyNF8. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@BlueWaveMike Hi, our customer service isn't able to answer the direct messages here currently. If you aren't able to contact them via the chat, please call them. You can find the phone number here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@lapislon Hi, I am very glad to hear you had a fantastic flight with us! :) All our crew is trained to fly with the different aircraft types to different destinations. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
